original_title: To The Ends of the Earth – The Hunt for the Jackal
overview: In writer David Yallop began a hunt for the world's most wanted man, Carlos the Jackal. This film follows Yallop from the beginning of his long and perilous quest to the climax of an eventual meeting with Carlos in the Middle East.  It uncovers collusion, conspiracy and terrorism to find the reality behind the myth.
title: To The Ends of the Earth – The Hunt for the Jackal
